record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2991
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2991 -- (Senate - May 07, 2008)

[Page: S3931]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 2991, introduced earlier today by Senator Reid of Nevada, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2991) to provide energy price relief and hold oil companies and other entities accountable for their actions with regard to high energy prices, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: The objection having been heard, the bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
